About.title: About Us
About.description: We are a transportation services company offering ride-hailing through a WhatsApp Business group. Customers can request a ride at any time, and the nearest available driver responds immediately. We operate using a fleet of organized private cars driven by professional drivers. We also provide car leasing services, car sales assistance, and corporate transportation contracts.

rideHailing.title: Ride-Hailing via WhatsApp
rideHailing.description: We manage a dedicated WhatsApp Business group for instant ride requests.
points: Customers send a request in the group

leasing.title: Car Leasing & Sales for Owners
leasing.description: We offer a full car leasing and selling service for vehicle owners:
points: Owners can list their cars for rent or sale
We handle marketing, communication, and coordination
Full management of the leasing and handover process

corporate.title: Corporate Transportation Contracts
corporate.description: We provide long-term transportation services for factories and companies:
points: Daily staff transportation for workers, engineers, and technicians
